00052 /*! This class stores a zone's background value */
00053 typedef struct _BackgroundZoneType
00054 {
00055         /*! The X coordinate of the center of the zone. */
00056         float centerx;
00057 
00058         /*! The Y coordinate of the center of the zone. */
00059         float centery;
00060 
00061         /*! The zone's background value */
00062         float background;
00063 
00064         /*! Assignment operator
00065          * @param zn The zone to copy
00066          * @return The new zone object
00067          */
00068         _BackgroundZoneType operator=(_BackgroundZoneType zn)
00069         {
00070                 centerx = zn.centerx; 
00071                 centery = zn.centery; 
00072                 background = zn.background; 
00073                 return *this; 
00074         }
00075 } BackgroundZoneType;
00076 
00077 /*! The size of the zone as stored in a CHP file. */
00078 #define ZONE_INFO_TYPE_SIZE (3*sizeof(float))
00079 
00080 /*! An STL list of zones */
00081 typedef std::list<BackgroundZoneType> BackgroundZoneTypeList;
00082 
00083 /*! Stores a list of zones for the entire array */
00084 typedef struct _BackgroundZoneInfo
00085 {
00086         /*! The number of zones used in the array */
00087         int number_zones;
00088 
00089         /*! The smoothing factor used to calculate the zone backgrounds */
00090         float smooth_factor;
00091 
00092         /*! The list of zone background values */
00093         BackgroundZoneTypeList zones;
00094 } BackgroundZoneInfo;

00098 /*! This class provides storage for the CHP file header */
00099 class CCHPFileHeader
00100 {
00101 public:
00102         /*! Constructor */
00103         CCHPFileHeader();
00104 
00105         /*! Destructor */
00106         ~CCHPFileHeader();
00107 
00108 public:
00109         /*! Defines the assay type for the array */
00110         typedef enum {Expression, Genotyping, Resequencing, Universal, Unknown} GeneChipAssayType;
00111 
00112 protected:
00113         /*! The magic number in the file */
00114         int m_Magic;
00115 
00116         /*! The version number in the file */
00117         int m_Version;
00118 
00119         /*! The number of feature columns in the array */
00120         unsigned short m_Cols;
00121 
00122         /*! The number of feature rows in the array */
00123         unsigned short m_Rows;
00124 
00125         /*! The number of probe set results */
00126         int m_NumProbeSets;
00127 
00128         /*! The type of results stored in the CHP file */
00129         GeneChipAssayType m_AssayType;
00130 
00131         /*! The chip type or probe array type of the CHP file */
00132         std::string m_ChipType;
00133 
00134         /*! The name of the algorithm used to create the CHP file */
00135         std::string m_AlgorithmName;
00136 
00137         /*! The version number of the algorithm used to create the CHP file */
00138         std::string m_AlgorithmVersion;
00139 
00140         /*! The name of the CEL file used in the creation of the CHP file */
00141         std::string m_ParentCellFile;
00142 
00143         /*! The programmatic identifier of the algorithm used to create the CHP file */
00144         std::string m_ProgID;
00145 
00146         /*! The list of algorithm parameters */
00147         TagValuePairTypeList m_AlgorithmParameters;
00148 
00149         /*! A list of summary parameters generated by the CHP file generating algorithm */
00150         TagValuePairTypeList m_SummaryParameters;
00151 
00152         /*! The background's for each of the zones (calculated by the expression algorithm) */
00153         BackgroundZoneInfo m_BackgroundZoneInfo;
00154 
00155         /*! Parses the parameters string into a list given the delimiters.
00156          * @param tagList The resulting parameter name/value list.
00157          * @param strSource The parameters in a string representation
00158          * @param sDelimiter1 The delimiter between each parameter
00159          * @param sDelimiter2 The delimiter between the tag and value
00160          */
00161         void ParseString(TagValuePairTypeList &tagList,
00162                                          std::string strSource,
00163                                          std::string sDelimiter1, 
00164                                          std::string sDelimiter2);
00165 
00166         /*! Clears the class members */
00167         void Clear();
00168 
00169         /*! Friend to the parent object */
00170         friend class CCHPFileData;
00171 
00172 public:
00173         /*! Gets the number of feature columns
00174          * @return The number of feature columns
00175          */
00176         int GetCols() const { return m_Cols; }
00177 
00178         /*! Gets the number of feature rows
00179          * @return The number of feature rows
00180          */
00181         int GetRows() const { return m_Rows; }
00182 
00183         /*! Gets the number of probe sets
00184          * @return The number of probe sets
00185          */
00186         int GetNumProbeSets() const { return m_NumProbeSets; }
00187 
00188         /*! Gets the assay type
00189          * @return The assay type
00190          */
00191         GeneChipAssayType GetAssayType() const { return m_AssayType; }
00192 
00193         /*! Gets the chip type
00194          * @return The chip type
00195          */
00196         std::string GetChipType() const { return m_ChipType; }
00197 
00198         /*! Gets the algorithm name
00199          * @return The algorithm name
00200          */
00201         std::string GetAlgName() const { return m_AlgorithmName; }
00202 
00203         /*! Gets the algorithm version
00204          * @return The algorithm version
00205          */
00206         std::string GetAlgVersion() const { return m_AlgorithmVersion; }
00207 
00208         /*! Gets the algorithm parameters
00209          * @return The number of feature columns
00210          */
00211         TagValuePairTypeList &AlgorithmParameters() { return m_AlgorithmParameters; }
00212 
00213         /*! Gets the summary parameters
00214          * @return The summary parameters
00215          */
00216         TagValuePairTypeList &SummaryParameters() { return m_SummaryParameters; }
00217 
00218         /*! Gets the parent CEL file
00219          * @return The parent CEL file
00220          */
00221         std::string GetParentCellFile() const { return m_ParentCellFile; }
00222 
00223         /*! Gets the prog ID
00224          * @return The prog ID
00225          */
00226         std::string GetProgID() const { return m_ProgID; }
00227 
00228         /*! Gets a specific algorithm parameter given a name/tag
00229          * @return The specific algorithm parameter given a name/tag
00230          */
00231         std::string GetAlgorithmParameter(const char *tag);
00232 
00233         /*! Gets a specific summary parameter given a name/tag
00234          * @return The specific summary parameter given a name/tag
00235          */
00236         std::string GetSummaryParameter(const char *tag);
00237 
00238         /*! Gets the background zone information
00239          * @return The background zone information
00240          */
00241         BackgroundZoneInfo &GetBackgroundZoneInfo() { return m_BackgroundZoneInfo; }
00242 
00243         /*! Gets the list of background zone positions and values
00244          * @return The list of background zone positions and values
00245          */
00246         BackgroundZoneTypeList &GetBackgroundZones() { return m_BackgroundZoneInfo.zones; }
00247 
00248         /*! Gets the background value for a given center coordinate
00249          * @return The background value for a given center coordinate
00250          */
00251         BackgroundZoneType GetBackgroundZone(int x, int y);
00252 
00253         /*! Gets the magic number
00254          * @return The magic number
00255          */
00256         int GetMagicNumber() const { return m_Magic; }
00257 
00258         /*! Gets the version number
00259          * @return The version number
00260          */
00261         int GetVersionNumber() const { return m_Version; }
00262 
00263         /*! Sets the number of columns
00264          * @param n The number of columns.
00265          */
00266         void SetCols(int n) { m_Cols=n; }
00267 
00268         /*! Sets the number of rows
00269          * @param n The number of rows.
00270          */
00271         void SetRows(int n) { m_Rows=n; }
00272 
00273         /*! Sets the number of probe sets
00274          * @param n The number of probe sets.
00275          */
00276         void SetNumProbeSets(int n) { m_NumProbeSets=n; }
00277 
00278         /*! Sets the assay type
00279          * @param t The assay type.
00280          */
00281         void SetAssayType(GeneChipAssayType t) { m_AssayType=t; }
00282 
00283         /*! Sets the chip type or probe array type
00284          * @param s The chip type or probe array type.
00285          */
00286         void SetChipType(const char *s) { m_ChipType=s; }
00287 
00288         /*! Sets the algorithm name
00289          * @param s The algorithm name.
00290          */
00291         void SetAlgName(const char *s) { m_AlgorithmName=s; }
00292 
00293         /*! Sets the algorithm version
00294          * @param s The algorithm version.
00295          */
00296         void SetAlgVersion(const char *s) { m_AlgorithmVersion=s; }
00297 
00298         /*! Sets the parent CEL file
00299          * @param s The parent CEL file.
00300          */
00301         void SetParentCellFile(const char *s) { m_ParentCellFile=s; }
00302 
00303         /*! Sets the prog ID
00304          * @param s The programatic identifier
00305          */
00306         void SetProgID(const char *s) { m_ProgID=s; }
00307 };

00324 /*! Present call for expression analysis */
00325 #define ABS_PRESENT_CALL 0
00326 
00327 /*! Marginal call for expression analysis */
00328 #define ABS_MARGINAL_CALL 1
00329 
00330 /*! Absent call for expression analysis */
00331 #define ABS_ABSENT_CALL 2
00332 
00333 /*! No call call for expression analysis */
00334 #define ABS_NO_CALL 3
00335 
00336 /*! Increase call for expression comparison analysis */
00337 #define COMP_INCREASE_CALL 1
00338 
00339 /*! Decrease call for expression comparison analysis */
00340 #define COMP_DECREASE_CALL 2
00341 
00342 /*! Moderate increase call for expression comparison analysis */
00343 #define COMP_MOD_INCREASE_CALL 3
00344 
00345 /*! Moderate decrease call for expression comparison analysis */
00346 #define COMP_MOD_DECREASE_CALL 4
00347 
00348 /*! No change call for expression comparison analysis */
00349 #define COMP_NO_CHANGE_CALL 5
00350 
00351 /*! No call call for expression comparison analysis */
00352 #define COMP_NO_CALL 6
00353 
00354 /*! Expression analysis probe set results for the MAS5 algorithm */
00355 class CExpressionProbeSetResults : public CProbeSetResults
00356 {
00357 public:
00358         /*! The detection p-value */
00359         float DetectionPValue;
00360 
00361         /*! The signal value */
00362         float Signal; 
00363 
00364         /*! The number of probe pairs in the set */
00365         unsigned short NumPairs;
00366 
00367         /*! The number of probe pairs used to calculate the signal value */
00368         unsigned short NumUsedPairs;
00369 
00370         /*! The detection call */
00371         unsigned char Detection;
00372 
00373         /*! Flag indicating that comparison results exist */
00374         bool m_HasCompResults;
00375 
00376         /*! The change p-value */
00377         float ChangePValue; 
00378 
00379         /*! The signal log ratio */
00380         float SignalLogRatio; 
00381 
00382         /*! The signal log ratio low value */
00383         float SignalLogRatioLow; 
00384 
00385         /*! The signal log ratio high value */
00386         float SignalLogRatioHigh; 
00387 
00388         /*! The number of probe pairs in common between the experiment and baseline data */
00389         unsigned short NumCommonPairs;
00390 
00391         /*! The change call */
00392         unsigned char Change;
00393 
00394         /*! Returns a string representation of the detection call.
00395          * @return The detection call
00396          */
00397         std::string GetDetectionString();
00398 
00399         /*! Returns a string representation of the change call.
00400          * @return The change call
00401          */
00402         std::string GetChangeString();
00403 
00404         /*! Assignment operator
00405          * @param src The object to copy
00406          * @return The copied object
00407          */
00408         CExpressionProbeSetResults operator=(CExpressionProbeSetResults &src);
00409 
00410         /*! Constructor */
00411         CExpressionProbeSetResults() { m_HasCompResults = false; }
00412 
00413         /*! Destructor */
00414         ~CExpressionProbeSetResults() {}
00415 };

00431 /*! Genotyping analysis probe set results */
00432 class CGenotypeProbeSetResults : public CProbeSetResults
00433 {
00434 public:
00435         /*! The allele call */
00436         unsigned char AlleleCall;
00437 
00438         /*! The confidence associated with the allele call */
00439         float Confidence;
00440 
00441         /*! The relative allele strength for the first block */
00442         float RAS1;
00443 
00444         /*! The relative allele strength for the second block */
00445         float RAS2;
00446 
00447         /*! The p-value associated with an AA call */
00448         float pvalue_AA;
00449 
00450         /*! The p-value associated with an AB call */
00451         float pvalue_AB;
00452 
00453         /*! The p-value associated with an BB call */
00454         float pvalue_BB;
00455 
00456         /*! The p-value associated with an no call call */
00457         float pvalue_NoCall;
00458 
00459         /*! Returns a string representation of the allele call.
00460          * @return The allele call
00461          */
00462         std::string GetAlleleCallString();
00463 
00464         /*! Assignment operator
00465          * @param src The object to copy
00466          * @return The copied object
00467          */
00468         CGenotypeProbeSetResults operator=(CGenotypeProbeSetResults &src);
00469 
00470         /*! Constructor */
00471         CGenotypeProbeSetResults() {Confidence=RAS1=RAS2=pvalue_AA=pvalue_AB=pvalue_BB=pvalue_NoCall=0;}
00472 
00473         /*! Destructor */
00474         ~CGenotypeProbeSetResults() {}
00475 };

00512 /*! A structure to hold a force call, its position and reason.
00513  *
00514  * A force call is the call the algorithm would have made if the thresholds
00515  * were not applied.
00516  */
00517 typedef struct _ForceCallType
00518 {
00519         /*! The position (index) of the call. */
00520         int position;
00521 
00522         /*! The force call. */
00523         char call;
00524 
00525         /*! The reason for the call. */
00526         unsigned char reason;
00527 
00528 } ForceCallType;
00529 
00530 /*! The force call was made due to no signal threshold. */
00531 #define NO_SIGNAL_THR_FORCE_CALL 'N'
00532 
00533 /*! The force call was made due to weak signal threshold. */
00534 #define WEAK_SIGNAL_THR_FORCE_CALL 'W'
00535 
00536 /*! The force call was made due to saturation level. */
00537 #define SATURATION_LEVEL_FORCE_CALL 'S'
00538 
00539 /*! The force call was made due to quality score threshold. */
00540 #define QUALITY_SCORE_THR_FORCE_CALL 'Q'
00541 
00542 /*! The force call was made due to failed both trace and sequence profiles. */
00543 #define TRACE_AND_SEQUENCE_PROFILES_FORCE_CALL 'F'
00544 
00545 /*! The force call was made due to base reliability threshold. */
00546 #define RELIABILITY_THR_FORCE_CALL 'B'
00547 
00548 /*! A structure to hold a base call at a given position (index). */
00549 typedef struct _BaseCallType
00550 {
00551         /*! The position (index) of the call. */
00552         int position;
00553 
00554         /*! The call. */
00555         char call;
00556 
00557 } BaseCallType;
00558 
00559 /*! Resequencing results. */
00560 class CResequencingResults
00561 {
00562 protected:
00563         /*! The called bases. */
00564         std::vector<char> calledBases;
00565 
00566         /*! Base call scores. */
00567         std::vector<float> scores;
00568 
00569         /*! An array of force calls - base calls the algorithm would have made if the thresholds were removed. */
00570         std::vector<ForceCallType> forceCalls;
00571 
00572         /*! An array of original calls. The calledBases contained the results of the algorithm and user edits.
00573          * If a user edits a base the original algorithm called base is stored in this vector.
00574          */
00575         std::vector<BaseCallType> origCalls;
00576 
00577 public:
00578         /*! Constructor */
00579         CResequencingResults() {}
00580 
00581         /*! Destructor */
00582         ~CResequencingResults() { Clear(); }
00583 
00584         /*! Clears the members. */
00585         void Clear() { calledBases.clear(); scores.clear(); forceCalls.clear(); origCalls.clear(); }
00586 
00587         /*! Gets the called bases.
00588          * @return The array of called bases.
00589          */
00590         const std::vector<char> &GetCalledBases() { return calledBases; }
00591 
00592         /*! Gets the called base at the given index.
00593          * @param index The index to the called bases array.
00594          * @return The called base.
00595          */
00596         char GetCalledBase(int index) { return calledBases[index]; }
00597 
00598         /*! Gets the size of the called bases array.
00599          * @return The size of the called bases array.
00600          */
00601         int GetCalledBasesSize() const { return (int) calledBases.size(); }
00602 
00603         /*! Resizes the called bases array.
00604          * @param size The size of the array.
00605          */
00606         void ResizeCalledBases(int size) { calledBases.resize(size); }
00607 
00608         /*! Sets the called base.
00609          * @param index The index to the array.
00610          * @param call The call.
00611          */
00612         void SetCalledBase(int index, char call) { calledBases[index] = call; }
00613 
00614         /*! Gets the scores.
00615          * @return The array of scores.
00616          */
00617         const std::vector<float> &GetScores() { return scores; }
00618 
00619         /*! Gets the score at the given index.
00620          * @param index The index to the scores array.
00621          * @return The score.
00622          */
00623         float GetScore(int index) { return scores[index]; }
00624 
00625         /*! Gets the size of the scores array.
00626          * @return The size of the scores array.
00627          */
00628         int GetScoresSize() const { return (int) scores.size(); }
00629 
00630         /*! Resizes the scores array.
00631          * @param size The size of the array.
00632          */
00633         void ResizeScores(int size) { scores.resize(size); }
00634 
00635         /*! Sets the score.
00636          * @param index The index to the array.
00637          * @param score The score.
00638          */
00639         void SetScore(int index, float score) { scores[index] = score; }
00640 
00641         /*! Gets the force calls.
00642          * @return The array of force calls.
00643          */
00644         const std::vector<ForceCallType> &GetForceCalls() { return forceCalls; }
00645 
00646         /*! Gets the force call at the given index.
00647          * @param index The index to the force calls array.
00648          * @return The force call.
00649          */
00650         ForceCallType GetForceCall(int index) { return forceCalls[index]; }
00651 
00652         /*! Gets the size of the force calls array.
00653          * @return The size of the force calls array.
00654          */
00655         int GetForceCallsSize() const { return (int) forceCalls.size(); }
00656 
00657         /*! Resizes the force calls array.
00658          * @param size The size of the array.
00659          */
00660         void ResizeForceCalls(int size) { forceCalls.resize(size); }
00661 
00662         /*! Sets the force call.
00663          * @param index The index to the array.
00664          * @param call The force call.
00665          */
00666         void SetForceCall(int index, ForceCallType call) { forceCalls[index] = call; }
00667 
00668         /*! Gets the original called bases.
00669          * @return The array of original calls.
00670          */
00671         const std::vector<BaseCallType> &GetOrigCalls() { return origCalls; }
00672 
00673         /*! Gets the original called base at the given index.
00674          * @param index The index to the original calls array.
00675          * @return The original call.
00676          */
00677         BaseCallType GetOrigCall(int index) { return origCalls[index]; }
00678 
00679         /*! Gets the size of the original calls array.
00680          * @return The size of the original calls array.
00681          */
00682         int GetOrigCallsSize() const { return (int) origCalls.size(); }
00683 
00684         /*! Resizes the original calls array.
00685          * @param size The size of the array.
00686          */
00687         void ResizeOrigCalls(int size) { origCalls.resize(size); }
00688 
00689         /*! Sets the original call.
00690          * @param index The index to the array.
00691          * @param call The original call.
00692          */
00693         void SetOrigCall(int index, BaseCallType call) { origCalls[index] = call; }
00694 };

00698 /*! This class provides storage and reading capabilities for CHP files */
00699 class CCHPFileData  
00700 {
00701 public:
00702         /*! Constructor */
00703         CCHPFileData();
00704 
00705         /*! Destructor */
00706         ~CCHPFileData();
00707 
00708 protected:
00709         /*! The file header object */
00710         CCHPFileHeader m_Header;
00711 
00712         /*! The full path of the CHP file */
00713         std::string m_FileName;
00714 
00715         /*! A string to hold an error message associated with a read operation */
00716         std::string m_strError;
00717 
00718         /*! The vector of probe set results */
00719         std::vector<CProbeSetResults *> m_ProbeSetResults;
00720 
00721         /*! The resequencing results. */
00722         CResequencingResults m_ReseqResults;
00723 
00724         /*! Opens the file for reading.
00725          * @param bReadHeaderOnly Flag to indicate if the header is to be read only.
00726          * @return True if successful.
00727          */
00728         bool Open(bool bReadHeaderOnly=false);
00729 
00730 public:
00731         /*! Accessors to header.
00732          * @return The header data object
00733          */
00734         CCHPFileHeader &GetHeader() { return m_Header; }
00735 
00736         /*! Returns the expression probe set result
00737          * @param index The index to the result object of interest.
00738          * @return The expression result.
00739          */ 
00740         CExpressionProbeSetResults *GetExpressionResults(int index);
00741 
00742         /*! Returns the genotyping probe set result
00743          * @param index The index to the result object of interest.
00744          * @return The genotyping result.
00745          */
00746         CGenotypeProbeSetResults *GetGenotypingResults(int index);
00747 
00748         /*! Returns the universal (tag array) probe set result

00751          */
00752         CUniversalProbeSetResults *GetUniversalResults(int index);

00757         CResequencingResults *GetResequencingResults();

00760          * @return A string message describing a read error
00761          */
00762         std::string GetError() const { return m_strError; }

00770         bool ReadHeader();

00773          * @return True if the file exists.

00775         bool Exists();

00779          */
00780         bool IsXDACompatibleFile();

00787         void SetFileName(const char *name) { m_FileName = name; }
00788

00792         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
